Name: Roberta Oliveira
Description: Roberta was deliberately struck by a vehicle. She was a twenty eight year old Brazilian transgender woman living in Italy.

Name: Paulina Mendez Cartagena
Description:
Paulina was shot twice in the head.

She was in Guatemala city with another trans woman when four men wearing police uniforms and riding motorbikes ordered them to stop and then shot both of them. Paulina was shot twice in the head, and died minutes later. Sulma, the other victim, survived three gunshot wounds.

Paulina worked for Integral Sexuality AIDS Support Organisation (OASIS).
